meanings.definition: A type of deli meat often used in sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of schwartzes in my sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The schwartzes in this sandwich is so flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The schwartzes in my sandwich made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The schwartzes added a burst of flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent5: The juicy schwartzes in the sandwich made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: To season or flavor with a mixture of spices, typically including black pepper and paprika.
meanings.sent1: Can you schwartzes the soup with some spices?
meanings.sent2: I always schwartzes my dishes with a blend of spices.
meanings.sent3: She loves to schwartzes her food with different seasonings.
meanings.sent4: The chef schwartzes the steak perfectly for a rich taste.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the schwartzes filled the kitchen with warmth.
